Package game

Class GameObject

  • java.lang.Object
    • game.GameObject
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    CameraObservedObject
    public class GameObject
extends java.lang.Object
    One independent part of the game, bound to a location.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      protected java.awt.Point absoluteLocation
      The location of this object in absolute space.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      GameObject​(double x, double y)
      This constructor sets the absoluteLocation to match x and y, after scaling them by Main.SIZE_FACTOR.

    • Method Summary

      Sets this GameObject and all its Graphics to expire.

      void markPainted()
      Take this component off the schedule for painting.

      Boolean which tells the scene this component has new graphical components.
      void repaint()
      Schedule this component for adding graphics to the scene.
